maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: en_US
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: fr_FR

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: en_US
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: fr_FR

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: en_US
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: fr_FR

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: en_US
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: fr_FR
... Salut !

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Hey!
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Hé !

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: It's nice here, isn't it?
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: C'est sympa ici, non ?

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: [nods]
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: I've gotten way past Autumn's Rise already, but it's still my favorite area.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Je suis déjà allé bien plus loin que \v[area.autumn-area.name], mais ça reste mon endroit préféré.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: So I come back here to relax when I'm getting frustrated with the game.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Donc je reviens ici pour me relaxer quand je deviens frustré avec le jeu.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Oh, hello.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Oh, bonjour.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Hi!
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Salut !

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: You want to give this to me?
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Vous voulez me donner ça ?

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: [nods]
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: That's awfully nice of you. May I ask why?
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: C'est vraiment sympa de ta part. Est-ce que je peux demander pourquoi ?

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Hi... Lea... Hi...
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Salut... Lea... Salut...

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Wait, what? Please tell me your voice module is broken.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Euh, hein ? Dis-moi que ton module vocal est cassé.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: [nods]
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Phew, well no problem. It can happen.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Pfiou, bon, pas de problème. Ça peut arriver.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: An old and abandoned observatory
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Un vieil observatoire abandonné

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Read inscription
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Lire l'inscription

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: \c[3]The Observatory\c[0]
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: \c[3]L'Observatoire\c[0]

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: To observe those who seek all elements is our duty.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Observer ceux qui traquent tous les éléments est notre devoir.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: If you dare to seek our wisdom, then only what is broken can open this door.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Si vous traquez notre savoir, alors seul ce qui est cassé peut ouvrir cette porte.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: So... \.Who do you think messaged us, Ellie?
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Donc...\. Tu penses que c'est qui, qui nous a envoyé un message, Ellie ?

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: No clue, but it's nice checking out the game after so long.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Aucune idée, mais je trouve ça sympa de regarder comment le jeu a évolué après si longtemps.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: True, it must have been like half a year ago.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: C'est vrai, ça doit faire genre 6 mois.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Work really started to pick up, so I didn't have that much time.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Avec le travail, je n'avais plus le temps pour ça.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Same here.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Pareil pour moi.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Hi!
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Salut !

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Why hello, horned one.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Tiens bonjour, la cornue.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Are you our mystery sender, perhaps?
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: C'est toi, notre expéditeur mystérieux ?

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: [shakes head]
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Why?
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Pourquoi ?

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: We've all got a message asking us to meet here.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: On a tous reçu un message qui nous disait de nous rencontrer ici.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: ...Wait!
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: ... Attends !

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Oh, so you do know something about our sender?
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Oh, donc tu sais quelque chose à propos de notre expéditeur ?

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: [nods]
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: So, who is it?
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Donc, qui c'est ?

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Sorry...
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Désolée...

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Dkar
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: D'kar

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Everyone's already here?
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Tout le monde est déjà là ?

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Dkar
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: D'kar

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Hi!
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Salut !

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Hey, kiddo. Nice to see you here.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Hé, gamine. C'est bien de te voir ici.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: ...Dad?
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: ... Papa ?

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Hey little ones...
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Bonjour les enfants...

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Oh, we should have guessed that.\.\. Dad was the one who sent the message!
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Oh. On aurait pu le deviner.\.\. C'était papa qui nous a envoyé le message !

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: That sure makes sense. What's up with the secrecy, dad?
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: C'est logique. Pourquoi tout ce mystère, Papa ?

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Well, you see...
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Bien, vous savez...

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: You've all been so busy and nobody had time to meet in the game to hang out with your old man.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Vous étiez tout si occupés, et plus personne n'avait de temps pour faire une partie avec votre vieux père.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: And I promised you we would finish this quest...
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Et je vous avais promis que l'on finirait cette quête.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: So, I thought if I could get it nearly done, you'd all come and play again.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Donc, je me disais que si je pouvais avancer suffisamment dessus, vous viendrez tous la finir avec moi.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Dad, really?
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Papa, sérieusement ?

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Yes... I know. You are all very busy.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Oui... Je sais. Vous êtes tous très occupés.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: I'm sorry to be a bother, it's just that I really miss you all.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Je suis désolé, c'est juste que vous me manquez beaucoup.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Oh Dad, that's not what Noah meant.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Ah, Papa, ce n'est pas ce que Noah voulait dire.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Why didn't you just call and tell us?
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Pourquoi est-ce que tu nous as pas simplement appelé ?

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Yeah, we don't need a fancy quest to hang out with our father.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Oui, on a pas besoin d'une quête pour passer du bon temps avec notre père.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Besides, Jonah and Sophie couldn't make it anyway.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: De toute façon, Jonah et Sophie n'ont pas pu venir.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: We'd need members of all classes, right?
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: On a besoin de joueurs de toutes les classes, non ?

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: You guys... I just didn't want to bother you with my problems.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Ah, les enfants... Je voulais pas vous enquiquiner avec mes problèmes.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Aww... Come on, dad. You can always talk to us!
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Ooooh, aller, Papa. Tu peux toujours venir nous parler !

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Now I feel very stupid.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Maintenant j'ai l'impression d'avoir l'air stupide.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Well, you should. And who is our blue-haired friend over here anyway?
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Bien, tu devrais l'être. Et c'est qui notre amie aux cheveux bleus là ?

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Lea!
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Lea !

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Yes, this is Lea. She helped me find all of those broken pieces needed for the quest.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Oui, c'est Lea. Elle m'a aidé à trouver tous les morceaux cassés pour la quête.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: In fact, I barely did anything...
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: En fait, c'est elle qui à tout fait...

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Oh boy, I'm sorry, Lea. I hope he wasn't too much of a problem. He can get very... dramatic sometimes.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Hé ben, je suis désolé, Lea. J'espère qu'il n'a pas été trop méchant avec toi. Parfois il aime bien faire dans le dramatique.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: He can get very, very dramatic sometimes.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Il a plusieurs fois eu un penchant pour le dramatique.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Hey now!
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Oui bon, ça va !

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: [shakes head]
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: It seems like a long talk is due.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: On devrait vraiment avoir une conversation sérieuse entre nous.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: How about we go to our favorite cafe in \v[area.rhombus-sqr.name] and have a chat?
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Qu'est-ce que vous en dites, si on allait à notre café préféré à \v[area.rhombus-sqr.name] pour discuter ?

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Maybe set a date on which Jonah and Sophie are available too?
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Et si possible, à une date où Jonah et Sophie ont du temps ?

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: That would be nice.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Ce serait bien.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: You kids go ahead, there's something I need to give to Lea before I leave.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Allez-y, je vous rejoins. Il faut que je donne quelque chose à Lea avant que j'y aille.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Alright. Bye Lea, it was nice meeting you.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: OK, on y va. Bye, Lea ! C'était sympa de te rencontrer.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Yeah, see ya around.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Yeah, à plus.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Bye!
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Bye !

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Dkar
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: D'kar

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Uhm...
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Euh...

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: It seems I owe you an apology.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Je crois que je dois te demander des excuses.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: I misjudged the whole situation.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: J'ai complètement mal jugé la situation.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: And made you get all these items for what now feels like nothing.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Et je t'ai fait récupérer tous ces objets, alors que maintenant, tout cela est devenu insignifiant.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Because of this, I think it is only fair that you have them.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: À cause de ça, je pense que ce serait équitable que tu les gardes.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Broken Equipment
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Équipements Cassés

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Dkar
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: D'kar

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Thank you for everything, Lea.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Merci pour tout, Lea.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: My kids are everything to me. But it seems I let my fear of losing them take over.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Mes enfants sont tout pour moi. J'ai tellement eu peur de les perdre, que j'en ai peut-être été aveuglé.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: I believed I did something wrong, but I guess this old man still has a lot to learn.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Je pensais que j'avais fait quelque chose de mal. Mais on dirait qu'un vieil homme à encore beaucoup à apprendre.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Anyway, I'll be on my way now.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Bien, en tout cas, je vais y aller, Lea.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Bye!
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Bye !

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Everything went well in the end.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Au final, tout s'est bien terminé.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: [nods]
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: But... \.\.We still do not know why he is wearing that armor.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Mais...\.\. On ne sait toujours pas pourquoi il porte cette armure.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Maybe he got it during the beta phase?
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Peut-être qu'il l'a obtenue pendant la phase bêta ?

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Looks like I am going to have a chat with our design team...
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Il faut que j'aille en toucher quelques mots à notre équipe de designers...

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Oh look, those plates started glowing!
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Hé, regarde, ces plaques se sont mises à briller !

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: What is broken has been found.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Ce qui a été cassé a été trouvé.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Now all shapes must come together to reveal the truth.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Maintenant, toutes les formes doivent se réunir pour faire la lumière sur la vérité.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: ...How?
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: ... Comment ?

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: All shapes, huh? Sounds like you need a player from each class to open this door?
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Toutes les formes ? Est-ce que ça veut dire qu'il faut un joueur de chaque classe pour ouvrir cette porte ?

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: [nods]
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Maybe you can ask Hlin to help out?
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Peut-être que tu peux demander de l'aide à Hlin ?

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: [nods]
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: What is broken has been found.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Ce qui a été cassé a été trouvé.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Now all shapes must come together to reveal the truth.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Maintenant, toutes les formes doivent s'unir pour dévoiler la vérité.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Hey, Lea.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Hé, Lea.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Hello dear!
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Bonjour chérie !

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Hi!
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Salut !

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Oh, where are Emilie and Tronny? Would you mind inviting them?
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Oh, où sont Emilie et Tronny ? Tu peux les inviter ?

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: [nods]
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Oh looks like Emilie is still missing. Would you mind inviting her too?
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Oh, on dirait qu'Emilie n'est toujours pas la. Tu peux l'inviter ?

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: [nods]
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Oh looks like Tronny is still missing. Would you mind inviting him too?
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Oh, on dirait que Tronny n'est toujours pas la. Tu lui demandes de venir ?

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: [nods]
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Looks like everyone is here, eh?
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: C'est bon, on est au complet !

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Hello, you two!
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Bonjour, vous deux !

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Bonjour! What are you guys doing here?
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Bonjour ! Qu'est-ce que vous faites tous ici ?

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: What? \.\.Didn't Lea tell you?
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Quoi ?\.\. Lea ne t'a pas raconté ?

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: ...How?
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: ... Comment ?

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Buggy, the joke's getting a bit old.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Buggy, la blague est un peu éculée maintenant.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Sorry, Ma'am.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Désolé, M'dame.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Anyway...
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Bon, sinon...

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: We are here today because Lea has found the 5 broken relics!
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Nous sommes tous ici en ce moment parce que Lea a trouvé les 5 reliques cassées !

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: With these she can unravel the secret behind this ruined observatory.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Grâce à elles, elle peut lever le voile sur le secret caché derrière cet observatoire en ruine.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: However, all 5 virtues must come together in unison to unlock the door!
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Mais pour ouvrir la porte, toutes les 5 vertus doivent se réunir !

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: As long as there's loot, I'm in!
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Tant qu'il y a du butin, moi je suis partante !

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: I didn't know there was such an event!
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Je n'étais même pas au courant de tout ça !

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Well, it's not easy to find as it's not connected to any other quest.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Oui, ce n'est pas facile de le découvrir, vu que ce n'est lié à aucune autre quête.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Each region has a secret area that contains one of the pieces.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Chaque région possède un emplacement secret qui contient une de ces cinq pièces.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Oh well, I was never good at finding all those secret locations.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Oui bon, je n'ai jamais été bon pour trouver tous ces emplacements secrets.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Typical new players. They don't know the joy of walking aimlessly through the wilds for hours.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Typique des petits nouveaux. Ils ne savent pas ce que c'est que le plaisir de déambuler dans la nature sauvage pendant des heures.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: All to find a piece of broken equipment.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Tout ça pour trouver un morceau d'équipement cassé !

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Nyeeahahahaha!
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Nyeeahahahaha !

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Why are you here, Buggy?
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Pourquoi est-ce que tu es là, Buggy ?

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: It's a secret to everybody.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: C'est un secret pour tout le monde.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: You haven't found any of these items yourself either, oui?
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Tu n'as pas trouvé un seul équipement par toi-même, oui ?

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Precisely.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Précisément.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: So what exactly do we need to do?
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Donc qu'est-ce qu'il faut faire maintenant ?

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Oui, oui! Where is the loot?!
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Oui, oui ! Où est le butin ?

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: It's quite simple, actually.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: C'est très simple, en fait.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: First, each one of us needs to hold one of the relics.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Déjà, chacun d'entre nous doit porter une de ces reliques dans sa main.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: The sword for a Triblader, the shield for a Quadroguard...
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: L'épée pour un Triblader, le bouclier pour un Quadroguard...

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: The gauntlet for a Pentafist, the deck for a Hexacast and finally...
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Les gantelets pour un Pentafist, le jeu de cartes pour un Hexacast, et enfin...

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: ...the chakrams for a Spheromancer!
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: ... les chakrams pour un Spheromanceur !

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Then, we stand next to the plates here and fit the relics in.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Ensuite, on se tient à côté de ces plaques, là, et on y met les reliques.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: And the rest is in the hands of the Ancients.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Pour le reste, on s'en remet aux Anciens.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Sounds simple enough, let's get on it!
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Ça a l'air suffisamment simple, allons-y !

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Right! Lea, dear. Do you mind handing each of us one of the relics?
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Oui ! Lea, chérie. Tu pourrais nous donner à chacun la bonne relique ?

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: [nods]
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Now, everyone! Fit in your relics and then step on the plates!
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Maintenant, tout le monde, attention ! Insérez votre relique et montez sur les plaques !

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Wow, funky!
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Woah, funky !

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Oh, there you are, dear.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Oh, te voilà, chérie.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Hi!
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Salut !

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: And? Did you like what you saw?
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Et ? Tu as aimé ce que tu as vu ?

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: [nods]
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: To think this is where the Ancients gazed upon the stars.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Quand on pense que c'est ici que les Anciens regardaient les étoiles...

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: I especially loved the bunnies on that mural.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: J'ai trouvé que les lapins sur les murs étaient classes.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Oh, come now, Buggy! Those were clearly meant to depict the Ancients themselves.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Rah, Buggy ! C'était clairement destiné à représenter les Anciens eux-mêmes.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: So, not bird people, but bunny people?
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Donc ce ne sont pas des hommes-oiseaux, mais des hommes-lapins ?

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Anyway, where are the other two?
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Peu importe, où sont les autres ?

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Welcome back! How was it?
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Rebonjour ! Comment c'était ?

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Well, it certainly was interesting.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Bien, c'était certainement intéressant.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: And we got some nice CP to spend.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Et on a obtenu des CP à dépenser.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Yes! More power for me!
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Oui, oui ! Plus de puissance pour moi !

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: All thanks to our chérie, Lea.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Tout ça grâce à notre Lea chérie.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Lea!
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Lea !

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Huh? Me?
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Hein ? Moi ?

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: No need to thank me, I'm happy I was able to help.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Pas besoin de me remercier, j'étais heureuse de pouvoir t'aider.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Especially with an event so rich in lore.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Surtout avec un évènement aussi riche en folklore.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: I hate to break up the party so soon, but I gotta run.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Je n'aime pas être celui qui s'en va déjà en premier, mais il faut que j'y aille.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: That's alright. Sadly, this is where the event ends anyway.
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: C'est bon. Malheureusement, c'est là que l'évènement se termine de toute façon.

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: I guess I'll make my way back to headquarters, eh?
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Je pense que je vais retourner au quartier général, non ?

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: See you soon, everyone!
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: À plus tard tout le monde !

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Bye!
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Bye !

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Au revoir!
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Au revoir !

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Bye!
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Bye !

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Logout
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Déconnexion

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Who's in for bashing some monsters with our newfound powers?
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Qui est partant pour aller castagner quelques monstres avec notre nouvelle puissance ?

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Oh wait, I haven't used my CP yet!
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Oh attends, j'ai pas encore utilisé mes CP !

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Code Knight
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Code Knight

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: Hi!
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Salut !

maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.orig: There are many strange places in this world...
maps/autumn/lake-observatory.json/entiti.text: Il y a tellement d'endroits étranges dans ce monde...
